meta.name: The Entertainment Mix
meta.description: Michelle McManus serves up big-name interviews, features and the latest in entertainment and culture news from across Scotland.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Michelle McManus serves up the best of entertainment in Scotland including chats with Paul Black, Robert Lindsay and Stevens & McCarthy. Plus, a session with SAY Award nominee Becky Sikasa.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Talking about his career and hit show Rivals, Gary Lamont joins Michelle McManus in the studio. Jason Donovan chats to Zara Janjua about touring with the Rocky Horror Show again.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Michelle McManus and Zara Janjua serve up the best of entertainment in Scotland, chatting to Karen Dunbar, Rhod Gilbert, Rag'n'Bone Man and Jodi Picoult.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Michelle McManus chats to Rick Astley and The B-52's singer Kate Pierson. Plus Nathan Evans performs in studio with The Saint PHNX band.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Michelle McManus chats to Gregor Fisher and Greg McHugh about Only Child, comedian Larry Dean shares stories behind his tour, and Joan Armatrading chats about her latest solo album.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Actor and producer Sam Heughan chats about the hugely anticipated return of Outlander. Plus, award-winning stand-up Katherine Ryan shares the inspiration behind her latest tour, Battleaxe.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Michelle chats to comedian Jason Byrne, singer-songwriter Katie Gregson-MacLeod and actor Peter Duncan. Nicola Meighan is joined by Simple Minds frontman Jim Kerr.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Michelle McManus gets in the festive spirit with Midge Ure, Still Game's Jane McCarry and Mark Cox, the cast of Shetland and of The Rig. Plus a Christmas performance with her band.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Michelle McManus serves up big name interviews, features and the latest in entertainment and culture news from across Scotland.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A glittering array of guests include Hollywood stars Julianne Nicholson and James Marsden, The Chief cast Jack Docherty and Carmen Pieraccini, Patti Boulaye and Kyle Falconer.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Michelle McManus presents another stunning line-up of stars from music, entertainment and film, including KT Tunstall, James Arthur, Gladiator Sabre, Zoe Lyons and Becky Sikasa.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Michelle McManus shares interviews from an all-star line-up including: Gary Kemp, Mhairi Black, Nina Conti, Craig Hill and Supermann on Da Beat. Plus music from Bottle Rockets.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: Michelle McManus presents all the latest in entertainment from Matt Goss, Callum Beattie, Glasgow Film Festival, Jojo Moyes and Chris Brookmyre, plus music from Fourth Daughter.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Michelle McManus with the latest in entertainment from James McArdle, Nick Mohammed, Nathan Carter, May and Robert Miller, and a celebration of all things country ahead of C2C Festival.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: Michelle McManus chats to Grado and Judith Ralston, Russell Kane, Kim Blythe, Julianne Nicolson and Eilidh Fisher. Plus, Len Pennie meets Makar Peter Mackay.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: Michelle McManus serves the best showbiz stories and big-name interviews from across Scotland. With Mark Bonnar, Matt Forde, Rebecca Vasmant, Tom Grennan, Susie McCabe and Lauren Mayberry.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Michelle's guests are Nathan Evans, Dan from Bastille, Siobhan McSweeney and Eric McCormack, Rianne Downey, and Nathan Sykes.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Michelle's guests include comedian Adam Hills, music icon Suzanne Vega, stand-up Stuart Mitchell and Transvision Vamp frontwoman Wendy James. Plus music from Butler, Blake & Grant.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Michelle welcomes Amy Macdonald, Karen Dunbar, Laurie Kynaston and Alex Lawther. Plus, a preview of the Scottish Album of the Year Award in Dundee and a performance from Brooke Combe.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Michelle's guests are KT Tunstall, Shetland stars Alison O'Donnell and Steven Robertson, and UB40. Plus Judith Ralston and Phil Goodlad take on a Children in Need challenge.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Michelle's guests include RuPaul's Drag Race UK queen Elle Vosque, Aberdeenshire's Calum Bowie, and pop powerhouse Ella Eyre.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Michelle's guests include Line of Duty star Vicky McClure and husband Jonny Owen as they bring their hit daytime clubbing event back to Scotland.
